version_description:
■ iTunes music view permission issue fixed for iOS 10.2
■ Some bug fixes
Small Bug Fixes

Us and the bugs:
test-test, find-find, log-log, fix-fix.
You and your videos:
crop-crop, cut-cut, trim-trim, post-post.

• Bug Fixes
• Ferformence Tuning
Minor Bug Fixes

And now, ladies and gentlemen, we’re going to show you the greatest Crop Video your eyes have ever beheld.

Get ready to taste the brand new version! On the menu today:
- Brand new design alla milanese (you can notice the Italian style vibes)
- Fresh presets, served with new mixed seasonal features, yummy!
- Juicy interface that you’ll just love - Chef’s special.
- As for the dessert - homemade icon, look how pretty it is!

Are you liking the brand new version of Crop Video? Well, after this update you're going to appreciate it even more!
We didn't have the time to celebrate this important milestone that our developers had already found and squashed some bugs for you. Isn't this amazing?

The people have spoken… and we heard you loud and clear! We're re-introducing the free cropping tool - it's the same one you learnt to love, just 45% faster and 18% nicer. You don't think our developers have been sitting on their hands, do you? They've been working relentlessly also to fix most of the issues you reported. Crop Video is now more stable then ever! And waterproof! (well, as long as your phone is…)

I know that it's hard to believe, but we actually read your reviews and listen to them. Crazy, right?

Hello creative people!
We are so happy that you are enjoying CropVideo! The goal we are aspiring to reach is to make video editing for you as simple as it can be. In this new version we’ve added a small but convenient feature - now the albums on media selection step are ordered by the number of videos - this way we hope that you’ll find the video you are looking for ASAP! We hope you’ll find it helpful!

With love and admiration,
Your Crop Video team

Us and the bugs:
test-test, find-find, log-log, fix-fix.
You and your videos:
crop-crop, cut-cut, trim-trim, post-post.

Hello creators!
We are glad you enjoy using Crop Video to make your videos even greater! To let you enjoy the app even more, we needed to fix some minor bugs, and.. that’s what we have diligently done! Happy cropping, friends!

Hello croppers! Are you thrilled by the upcoming spring? So are we.
For celebrating, we fixed a couple of bugs here and there, so you can get even more excited by the season.
Enjoy the sun and keep cropping!

Hello there!
We see you diligently snipping away on your beautiful spring videos, so we're just here to say well done! Aaaand... fix a few bugs here and there.
Hi creators! Guess what? We’ve fixed a very naaasty, annoying bug for you today, isn’t it great?! Indeed it is, totally worth making a video or two. Cheers!
